name: EscapeTheHedgemaze
description:
Gameplay

Escape the Hedgemaze is a game where you need to find a way out of a maze before it's too late.

The only way out of the maze is through the locked stone door and to unlock the you will need to find 2 keys.

Finding the chests won't be easy as the maze is procedurally generated and the longer you stay in the maze the higher the chance that they will find you.

Controls
  • Movement:  WASD
  • Flashlight:  E
  • Opening chests and the door: walking up to them (WASD)
